name: Ruin City Gasolina
description: Eliminate the invasion of mechanical invaders and save what remains of the once great city.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: DualCore CPU Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: GTS250/HD7770 or better Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore CPU Memory: 4096 MB RAM Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: any
